Enjoy!

If you're open to a bit of mystery and suspense, "The Wraith" (1986) could also be interesting for you. This movie tells the story of a mysterious man who targets a local gang of street racers, adding an element of intrigue to the action-packed plot!

The movie is filled with wit and humor, exploring complex relationships through its narrative.

If you're looking for something more adventurous, "Treasure Planet" might be just what you need! It's an animated science fiction adventure that tells the story of a young boy's journey to find a legendary treasure in space. With an impressive voice cast, including Joseph Gordon-Levitt and Emma Thompson, it's sure to provide both entertainment and visual appeal. Enjoy your movie time!

I'd highly recommend "Born on the Fourth of July" for you. This powerful film tells the true story of Ron Kovic, a patriotic U.S. Marine who becomes disillusioned with war after being paralyzed in Vietnam. The movie stars an outstanding performance by Tom Cruise as Kovic and offers a compelling look at one man's struggle for peace amidst conflict.

If you're interested in a more adventurous take on the era, "Flyboys" might also appeal to you. This film follows young American volunteers who join the French military during World War I and become the country's first fighter pilots, offering a thrilling depiction of aviation history. Enjoy the flight!
